title: How to Use an Electronic Digital Caliper

steps.headline: You have to make sure that the object you're going to measure is clean.
Clean the measurement tool because we need to get precise reading.
After you're done clean the object and the digital caliper, turn on the instrument and make sure the reading is at 0 then you can start.
Make sure you press the MM/IN to select the unit system that you want
Press the Zero buttons again to set it at 0
Put the lower jaw on the outside part of the item
Make sure both of the lower jaws are gently against the outside surfaces.
Make sure both of the lower jaws are gently against the outside surfaces.

text: You have to make sure that the object you're going to measure is clean.  Clean the measurement tool because we need to get precise reading.  After you're done clean the object and the digital caliper, turn on the instrument and make sure the reading is at 0 then you can start.  Make sure you press the MM/IN to select the unit system that you want  Press the Zero buttons again to set it at 0  Put the lower jaw on the outside part of the item  Make sure both of the lower jaws are gently against the outside surfaces.  Make sure both of the lower jaws are gently against the outside surfaces.
